messages.title: Tory Revival on Course to Foil Independence
messages.content: Tory Revival on Course to Foil Independence. Sunday Times Scotland, 23 April 2017.

messages.title: Your Scottish Conservative and Unionist Candidate for Perth and North Perthshire
messages.content: You have my guarantee that the Scottish Conservatives will oppose the SNP every step of the way.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Stand firm against the SNP's plans for another divisive independence referendum
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Commitment to opposing another referendum on independence.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Campaign to rejuvenate Perth city centre
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Plans to improve and revitalize Perth city centre.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Work to improve broadband and mobile connectivity in rural Perthshire
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Improving broadband and mobile connectivity in rural areas.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fight to strengthen our transport network including better rail links
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Strengthening the transport network with better rail links.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Ensure that Perthshire has a strong voice at the heart of Government
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Making sure Perthshire is well represented in government.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Ruth Davidson's Conservatives can take on the SNP here. Con 39%, SNP 34.4%, Lab 6.4%, LibDem 13.8%

issues.government: Ensure that Perthshire has a strong voice at the heart of Government.
issues.transport: Fight to strengthen our transport network including better rail links

community.content: Campaign to rejuvenate Perth city centre.
Work to improve broadband and mobile connectivity in rural Perthshire.

images.caption: Ian Duncan, your candidate for Perth and North Perthshire.

examples: Only Ruth Davidson's Conservatives can take on the SNP here. Con 39%, SNP 34.4%, Lab 6.4%, LibDem 13.8%
Tory Revival on Course to Foil Independence
You have my guarantee that the Scottish Conservatives will oppose the SNP every step of the way.
Stand firm against the SNP's plans for another divisive independence referendum.
Campaign to rejuvenate Perth city centre.
Work to improve broadband and mobile connectivity in rural Perthshire.
Fight to strengthen our transport network including better rail links.
Ensure that Perthshire has a strong voice at the heart of Government.
Stand firm against the SNP's plans for another divisive independence referendum.
Stand firm against the SNP's plans for another divisive independence referendum.
